title: Android 13 DP1 introduces a Gboard-like clipboard auto clear feature
content:
Google has released the first developer preview build of Android 13, giving us a look at some of the features and changes we can expect to see in the next big Android upgrade. As we highlighted in our previous coverage, the release includes updated privacy features, new themed icons, better language controls, and a host

The post Android 13 DP1 introduces a Gboard-like clipboard auto clear feature appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 introduces a new auto clear clipboard feature that automatically clears the primary clip from the global clipboard after a set duration.
